Name: Saighead
About the game: Saighead is a physics based strategy game in which you play as bow and you attempt to aim and hit the target. Become a master of the bow by playing through several levels with a variety of mechanics. KEY FEATURES Five Zones Play through the five zones of Saighead. Each zone has it's own theme and challenges making them feel unique. Journey through the meadows with bounce pads or a castle with portals. Figure out how to conquer each zone! Challenging Game Modes Introducing three different game modes, Master Mode, God Mode, and Timed Mode. These game modes enhance the difficulty of Saighead. Master mode and God Mode give you limited chances to complete the levels without failing. Timed Mode offers players a challenge who love to speed run through an entire section as fast as possible! Unlock Bows and Arrows Show off your bows and arrows in the game by completing the difficult achievements in each zone. Weather it's the colorful Starlight set or you can mix and match! Each item represents your skill as an archer.
